root.title: Ottuq Dash II (e-64)
root.place: Three steles, grey sandstones found near the mountain Ottuq-Dash, the left coast of river Ulug-Kem, in 30 km below the mouth of river Elegest.
root.store: Adriyanov delivered to the Minusinsk museum on a raft across Yenisei in 1915.
root.general: 1 жол мәтін кеңінен атыздалып қашалған. Тастың бір бетіне ұзына бойы жазылған.
root.description: The stele almost square in section, the surface is roughly polished. The inscription is cut with wide grooves in 1 line, on all length of the stele.
root.investigation: Adriyanov found in 1915 near the Ottuq Dash I (e-4).

pdf.f_title: Памятники тюркской рунической письменности азиатского ареала.
